description: This file defines the AuthGuard React component that wraps protected routes, verifies user session status via API calls, and renders either the protected content or a login prompt.

methods.name: AuthGuard({ children })
methods.description: React functional component that enforces authentication for its children. Shows a loading spinner while verifying session, prompts login if unauthenticated, or renders children if authenticated.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user login redirection by obtaining the login URL and redirecting the browser.
